name: Uima-ext
tagline: A set of Apache UIMA components (mostly) for Russian language processing
body:
# Introduction

# List of modules
* Commons
* CasAccessObject
* Evaluation
* Corpus.*
 * Statistics
* Tokenizer.*:
 * API
 * Simple
* SentenceSplitter.*:
 * API
 * Heuristic
* Morph.*
 * Dictionary.*
  * API
  * OpenCorpora
  * Predict.OpenCorpora
* PosTagger.*
 * API
 * TCRF
 * Util.RNC
 * and others
 * Lab (located in UIMA.Ext.Morph.PosTaggingLab)
* Lemmatizer
 * API
 * OpenCorpora
* ML.Crfsuite
* PhraseRecognizer (experimental)
* Demo.PipelineExample

# Publications
* [submitted] Gareev, R., Ivanov, V. A comparative evaluation of statistical Part-of-Speech taggers for Russian. In proceedings of RuSSIR-2014 YSC.
